getwd()

pdfs <- read.csv( "pdfs.csv" )

if( nrow( pdfs ) > 0 )
{
 for( i in 1:nrow(pdfs) )
 {  
   folder.name <- toString( pdfs$year[i] )
   dir.create( folder.name )
   setwd( folder.name )
   file.name <- paste0( pdfs$type[i], "-", pdfs$year[i], ".pdf" )
   try ( download.file( url = pdfs$url[i], 
                  destfile = file.name,
                  mode = "wb" ) )

 }
